name: ack-throw-guard
description: Warns when throw statements appear in ACK parser files -- parsers should return error-status NormalizedTool instead.

hooks.command: bash -c 'INPUT=$(cat); FILE=$(echo "$INPUT" | jq -r ".file_path // empty"); if [[ "$FILE" == *parsers/*.ts || "$FILE" == *parser.ts ]]; then CONTENT=$(echo "$INPUT" | jq -r ".content // .new_string // empty"); THROWS=$(echo "$CONTENT" | grep -nE "^\s*throw\s+(new\s+)?Error" | head -5); if [[ -n "$THROWS" ]]; then echo "WARNING: throw statements in parser files. ACK parsers should return error-status NormalizedTool instead of throwing:" >&2; echo "$THROWS" >&2; fi; fi'
